definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: Look for these sorts of explanations on the cards that accompany jewelry and head shop bric-a-brac.
sentences.chinese: 在首饰店里的珠宝标牌上也能找到这类解释。

sentences.english: The sign stood alone on the hood of the little white Saturn coupe.
sentences.chinese: 标牌树立在那辆白色汽车的引擎盖上。

sentences.english: Electroforming label production process is simple, the price is not high.
sentences.chinese: 电铸标牌生产工艺简单，价格不高。

sentences.english: After seven series, the "for sale" signs are finally going up on Wisteria Lane.
sentences.chinese: 在播出七季后，紫藤巷最终挂上了“出售”标牌。

sentences.english: My signs were selling very quickly. They were selling like hotcakes.
sentences.chinese: 我制作的标牌卖的很快，它们成为了畅销产品。

sentences.english: These gaudy signs all over campus are a real eyesore.
sentences.chinese: 这些花花绿绿的标牌立在校园里，怪碍眼的。

sentences.english: White panels indicate local or non-primary routes leading from the junction ahead.
sentences.chinese: 白色标牌指示从前方路口可以到达的地方或非主干道。

sentences.english: A big sign outside the village proclaims it as a “living fossil” of the language.
sentences.chinese: 村外的一块标牌上写着“语言的活化石”。

sentences.english: There is a sign-board over the bar.
sentences.chinese: 横杆的正上方有一块标牌。

sentences.english: This mark should be clear enough to avoid confusion.
sentences.chinese: 这一标牌应清楚而不会引起误解。

sentences.english: Look at the sign, danger keep out.
There was a sign on the cage that said $50.00.
sentences.chinese: 笼子上的标牌写着售价50美元。

sentences.english: Blue panels indicate that the motorway starts at the junction ahead.
sentences.chinese: 兰色标牌指示高速路自前方路口处开始。

sentences.english: Make actual "No Smoking" signs and hang them around your house and in your car.
sentences.chinese: 制作一个“禁止吸烟”的标牌挂在你的家中或者车中。

sentences.english: Maybe a sign on their car or bedroom door.
sentences.chinese: 亦可以做个标牌放在她的车上或者卧室门上。

definition: variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
bus information board/street sign for a bus stop/bus stop
